original_text: The curtains for the tent will be longer than the curtains for the tabernacle. The extra half of the curtain for the tent will hang at the back of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 그 막 곧 휘장의 그 나머지 반 폭은 성막 뒤에 늘어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: The curtains for the tent will be longer
sentences.korean_translation: 장막을 위한 휘장들은 더 길 것입니다

sentences.original_text: than the curtains for the tabernacle
The extra half of the curtain for the tent
will hang at the back of the tabernacle
